author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
My experience of turtles is limited to a yacht delivery from Spain to Tunisia along the north coast of Africa. The turtles were bobbing about in what is the main shipping route between the Suez Canal and the Strait of Gibraltar. I wonder how they survive, are they just pushed aside by the bow waves?
Also where are they going?

author: Phil
content:
They feed sea turtles mayo to flush the oil

Turtles Caught in Disastrous Oil Spill Treated With Mayonnaise
The tar-covered animals were given the condiment to flush out their digestive systems
https://www.smithsonianmag.com/smart-news/turtles-caught-disastrous-oil-spill-are-treated-mayonnaise-180977102/
